text: A Walk in the Clouds is a 1995 American Mexican romantic drama movie directed by Alfonso Arau and starring Keanu Reeves, Anthony Quinn, Debra Messing, Aitana Sánchez-Gijón, Giancarlo Giannini. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1995 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Mexican romance movies Category:Mexican drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Alfonso Arau Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in North Carolina Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies about veterans Category:Movies about agriculture Category:Movies about alcohol
title: A Walk in the Clouds
